mapper:
INSERT INTO hotelTable (hotelNumber, wido, kyengdo, hotelName, cityCode, zipcode, addr1, addr2, bdgType, hotelIMG, hotelInform, id) VALUES (#{hotelNumber}, #{wido}, #{kyengdo}, #{hotelName}, #{cityCode}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{bdgType}, #{hotelIMG}, #{hotelInform}, #{id})
roomNumber roomName hotelNumber roomImg roomInform maxGuest conv baseCost weekCost longCost
INSERT INTO roomTable (roomNumber, roomName, hotelNumber, roomImg, roomInform, maxGuest, conv, baseCost, weekCost, longCost) VALUES (#{roomNumber}, #{roomName}, #{hotelNumber}, #{roomImg}, #{roomInform}, #{maxGuest}, #{conv}, #{baseCost}, #{weekCost}, #{longCost})
